sense.def:
To wreck something
pomeni nekaj polomiti ali pokvariti.

seg.quote: I wrecked a good stereo by not following the instructions properly.
I'm sorry if I wrecked your weekend.
Piles of wrecked cars took up most of the space.

sense.def:
Kadar ladja
is wrecked
, je tako poškodovana, da se potopi.

seg.quote: ...Spanish vessels that had been wrecked off the North American coast.

sense.def:
A wreck
je letalo, avtomobil ali ladja, ki je uničena v nesreči.

seg.quote: All around were the wrecks of previous crashes.
The seabed where the wreck lies is level and rocky.
If you work like this you'll end up a wreck.
